articles.title: "36-Billion-Sun Black Hole Found Sleeping": Astronomers Spot Hidden Giant in Orange Galaxy Using Precision Gravitational Lensing - Rude Baguette
articles.description: IN A NUTSHELL 🌌 Astronomers discovered a dormant black hole 36 billion times the mass of the Sun. 🔭 Located in the Orange Galaxy, it was found using gravitational lensing techniques. 🪐 The black hole is part of a fossil group, marking the cosmic endgame of…
